Package MyFarm

Class Player

java.lang.Object
MyFarm.Player
public class Player extends Object
The Player object is the object that interacts with the FarmLot to grow crops

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    classUpgrade()
    Checks if player can rank up, if player is able to, player will rank up Displays the success of the action through a String The String also includes HTML styling String returned is intended to be received by the addNotif() function that is found in the FarmFrame class

    Displays the crucial information of the player through a String The String also includes HTML styling String returned is intended to be received by the setText() function for the profileLabelRight JLabel that is found in the FarmFrame class

    • classUpgrade

      public String classUpgrade()
      Checks if player can rank up, if player is able to, player will rank up Displays the success of the action through a String The String also includes HTML styling String returned is intended to be received by the addNotif() function that is found in the FarmFrame class
      Returns:
      in String form, the success or failure of classUpgrade action

    • displayPlayerStatus

      public String displayPlayerStatus()
      Displays the crucial information of the player through a String The String also includes HTML styling String returned is intended to be received by the setText() function for the profileLabelRight JLabel that is found in the FarmFrame class
      Returns:
      in String form, the information of this player
